Where: superior surface lies just below the skin

Attachment: medial point of attachment of deltoid
accomodates the edge of the head of the radius when the forearm is fully flexed

Attachment points names: facet for attachment of posterior cruciate ligament
facet for attachment of tendon of popliteus muscle
facet for attachment of anterior cruciate ligament
site of attachment of sartorius, gracilis and semitendinosus muscles
articular facet for proximal head of fibula
attachment site for fibular collateral ligament
attachment site for tend of biceps femoris muscle
facet for articulation with inferior surface of lateral condyle of tibia
